steps: step 6: Click on link testProjects (TestProject) -> Navigate to page '/team/*/project/*/test-project/*'
step 10: Run a test suite with advanced configuration options
step 12: Click on link OrganizationSetup -> Navigate to page '/organization/*/settings/agent'
step 13: Click on link AgentSetup -> Navigate to page '/team/*/project/*/test-planning'
step 15: Run a test suite with advanced configuration options
step 16: Click on link testRunViews (ViewEPPs) -> Navigate to page '/team/*/project/*/test-runs'
step 17: Click on header testRunTitles (EPPsAutomationTest) -> Navigate to page ''
step 18: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
